thread.title: The walking dead flesh-eating takeover at the Long Beach Zombie Walk.
thread.title_full: The walking dead flesh-eating takeover at the Long Beach Zombie Walk.

author: Roy Hassett
title: The walking dead flesh-eating takeover at the Long Beach Zombie Walk.
text:
The zombies are coming...Long Beach Zombie Walk https://longbeachzombiefest.com/
Join hordes of rotting revelers for Long Beachâ€™s annual zombie outbreak, a three-day invasion.
The walking dead flesh-eating takeover takes place October 23-25, 2015 at the Rainbow Lagoon in Long Beach, California.
This event is a jam-packed day with:
Live entertainment Dancing Michael Jackson thriller workshop Carnival games Exhibitors Costume contests Pumpkin carving contests Live interactive reptile exhibit Phantom coaches hearse club Freak show attraction Cinema make-up school workshop Wrestling The infamous Zombie Walk Hollywood special effects make-up artists Zombie fashion show Brain eating contest Art of horror exhibit Food court and more!
All guests get a complimentary souvenir e-photo with admission.
The zombie apocalypse becomes a reality here. Randomly, without warning throughout the day and night, a siren will alert and an outbreak will occur. At the sound of the Zombie Outbreak Siren, a swarm of zombies (the attendees) will suddenly invade the Rainbow Lagoon.
The event also features a zombie apocalypse laser tag hunt attraction. Hunters unite to save the world from the zombie apocalypse. Who will survive the zombie apocalypse hunt and stand alone among the walking dead is yet to be known.
Costumes of all sorts are encouraged, but are not mandatory. Come dead or alive.
